import groovyx.net.http.RESTClient import groovy.util.slurpersupport.GPathResult import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.TEXT import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
solr = new RESTClient('http://localhost:8000/execution_task/') def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper() def response = solr.post( contentType: JSON, body: jsonSlurper.parseText('{"auth_token": "ac2e1ab0-0805-45df-af1f-a82f070ba9b7", "job_id": 8}') ) log.info "Solr response body: ${response.data}" log.info "Solr response report_id: ${response.data.report_id}" solr_get = new RESTClient("http://localhost:8000/report_detail/") log.info "HERE" def response_get = solr_get.get(path: response.data.report_id) log.info "Get request response status: ${response_get.status}" log.info "Get request response bodyy: ${response_get.data}"
